name: Chronovolt
description:
Chronovolt, an action adventure in time. Pilot the Chronosphere through wonderful worlds to stop Dr Scabious and his army of Minions from controlling the end of the Universe. Use powerful time controls to stop and rewind time, open time gates and blast enemies into the past.
Chronovolt is a fiendish 3D puzzle-platformer in which you have to guide your rolling Chronosphere through the twists, turns, traps and hazards of the Escher-like levels. To keep the chase alive, you'll need speed, dexterity and determination to reach each Time Gate as Dr Scabious makes his escape.
Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.
1 player(s)
